EMBED.title: Thank you so much for adding me to your server! :)
EMBED.description:
To see my commands type `$PREFIXhelp` 
Type `$PREFIXanun <channel>` to set an announcement channel! 
If no channel has been set, I will send announcements on the first channel I find. 
Take a look on the Universal Chat (`$PREFIXhelp universal`), I think you will like it ;) 
If you find any translation error, send me with `$PREFIXreport messsage` 

**Use `$PREFIXregion change` para mudar meu idioma**

messageCreate.adminOnly: You need admin permission to use this command!
messageCreate.banned:
You're **banned** from using any command 
Reason: `$REASON` 

Acha que seu banimento foi injusto? User o comando `$PREFIXreport <report>`
Como tu conseguiu ser banido de um bot do discord?
messageCreate.noPermissions: Looks like I don't have the `$PERM` permission to execute my commands!
messageCreate.noCmd:
Need help? 
Type `$PREFIXhelp` to see all my commands categorys
messageCreate.nsfw: Use this command in a NSFW channel only. I think you don't want be banned

ERROR.title: An error ocurred, sorry for that

EMBED.description: Well... what can I say? My name is **Arnaldo** (something like "Arnald"). I was born on the 17th of April 2021. My father is **Vako** and my mummy is **Shy Girl**.

universal.description: Sets a channel to be the Universal Chat. Any message sent is this channel also will be sent (anonymously) to others servers with Universal Chat activated

universal.seeChannel: The current Universal Chat's channel is

EMBED.title: Welcome to the Universal Chat
EMBED.description:
Any message **sent** here will be also sent to **other servers** with the **Universal Chat** activated. 

**Be careful** with what you gonna say!

calc.invalid:
I don't have the IQ to do math that doesn't have `numbers` or `arithmetic operators` 

`+` - Addition 
`-` - Subtraction 
`*` or `x` - Multiplication 
`/` ou `÷` - Division
